Texto: 
delayed developmental milestones.

scoliosis
• enlarged left hemisphere with evidence of poor sulcation and thickened gyri.
• enlarged left lateral ventricle
• falx "displaced to the right
• band heterotopia of gray matter
cephalic disorders, hemimegalencephaly
cerebral gliomatosis
developmental delay
seizures that are difficult to control
